Investment Routes

Choose Your Investment Path

We offer multiple investment routes tailored to different risk appetites and capital plans. Our professional team will help you select the optimal solution.

Three Main Investment Routes

Route 1

Real Estate Investment

Purchase qualifying residential or commercial property in Hungary

Tangible asset ownership
Potential rental income
Property market appreciation
Family residence option
Investment Amount €300K+
Holding Period 5 years

*Specific requirements subject to policy and agreement

Recommended
Route 2

Government Bonds

Purchase Hungarian government-issued bonds with guaranteed return

Government-backed security
Fixed interest income
Low risk, stable returns
Simpler process and management
Investment Amount €250K
Holding Period 5 years

*Interest rates and terms subject to market and policy

Route 3

Business Investment

Establish or invest in a Hungarian company creating local jobs

Operate your own business
Access European market
Create value and employment
Flexible operational models
Investment Amount €350K+
Employment Required 5-10 staff

*Business plan and compliance review required

Why Choose Hungary for Investment

Favorable Tax Rates

Strategic Location

Central European hub, gateway to Eastern and Western markets

Skilled Workforce

Highly educated talent pool with multilingual capabilities

Growing Economy

Stable growth with strong EU support and infrastructure development
